name: CNISDKGeoFencingKit
summary: Geo Fencing kit extends the CNISDKCoreKit with geo fencing functionality.
description: Conichi SDK simplifies the use of Appleâ€™s iBeacon technology with conichi's hardware. In only few steps, you will be able to communicate with our beacons and receive actions confirmation by a conichi venue. With paymentKit it also enables the mobile payment.
